name: The ring of the Oni
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It decreases the users wisdom a bit.
It decreases the users intelligence a bit.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
